ISSUE.TITLE: Dexalot - Unexpected private key length using the v2_with_controllers script
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Ran a v2 market making controller on dexalot and observe the error below ``` 2025-01-11 22:08:12,003 - 15 - hummingbot.strategy.script_strategy_base - ERROR - Error adding controller: The private key must be exactly 32 bytes long, instead of 0 bytes. Traceback (most recent call last): File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_account/account.py", line 799, in _parsePrivateKey return self._keys.PrivateKey(HexBytes(key)) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_keys/datatypes.py", line 251, in __init__ validate_private_key_bytes(private_key_bytes) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_keys/validation.py", line 89, in validate_private_key_bytes validate_bytes_length(value, 32, "private key") File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_keys/validation.py", line 54, in validate_bytes_length raise ValidationError( eth_utils.exceptions.ValidationError: Unexpected private key length: Expected 32, but got 0 bytes The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/strategy/strategy_v2_base.py", line 222, in add_controller controller = config.get_controller_class()(config, self.market_data_provider, self.actions_queue) File "/home/hummingbot/controllers/market_making/pmm_dynamic.py", line 98, in __init__ super().__init__(config, *args, **kwargs) File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/strategy_v2/controllers/market_making_controller_base.py", line 226, in __init__ self.market_data_provider.initialize_rate_sources([ConnectorPair( File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/data_feed/market_data_provider.py", line 77, in initialize_rate_sources self._rate_sources[connector_pair.connector_name] = self.get_non_trading_connector( File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/data_feed/market_data_provider.py", line 196, in get_non_trading_connector connector = connector_class(**init_params) File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/connector/exchange/dexalot/dexalot_exchange.py", line 65, in __init__ self._tx_client: DexalotClient = self._create_tx_client() File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/connector/exchange/dexalot/dexalot_exchange.py", line 205, in _create_tx_client return DexalotClient( File "/home/hummingbot/hummingbot/connector/exchange/dexalot/data_sources/dexalot_data_source.py", line 37, in __init__ self.account: LocalAccount = Account.from_key(dexalot_api_secret) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_utils/decorators.py", line 20, in _wrapper return self.method(objtype, *args, **kwargs) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_account/account.py", line 263, in from_key key = self._parsePrivateKey(private_key) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_utils/decorators.py", line 20, in _wrapper return self.method(objtype, *args, **kwargs) File "/opt/conda/envs/hummingbot/lib/python3.10/site-packages/eth_account/account.py", line 801, in _parsePrivateKey raise ValueError( ValueError: The private key must be exactly 32 bytes long, instead of 0 bytes. ``` ### Steps to reproduce 1. Start hummingbot 2. Connect to dexalot 3. Create and start a **pmm_dynamic** controller on dexalot using the **v2_with_controllers** script ### Release version dev-2.3.0 ### Type of installation Source ### Attach required files _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #7373 from leocape/fix/bybit-update-trade-fees fix/bybit-update-trade-fees

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow Dexalot to run as a no-trading connector without passing credentials - fixes https://github.com/hummingbot/hummingbot/issues/7378
Allow Dexalot to run as a no-trading connector without passing credentials - fixes https://github.com/hummingbot/hummingbot/issues/7378
